tool_description: Calculates essential dignities and debilities for planets based on zodiac sign positions, including rulership, exaltation, detriment, and fall status.

planetary_positions.description: Array of planetary positions in degrees

planet_names.description: Names of planets for dignity analysis

error_messages: Mismatched arrays: planetary_positions and planet_names must have equal length.
Invalid dignity system: Use either 'traditional' or 'modern' dignity system.
Invalid planet names: Use standard planet names (Sun, Moon, Mercury, Venus, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn, Uranus, Neptune, Pluto).
Position calculation error: Unable to determine sign positions from provided degrees.
usage: Provide planetary_positions with corresponding planet_names. Optionally specify dignity_system (traditional excludes modern planets' rulerships). Returns dignity status for each planet.

dignity_scores.description: Numerical dignity scores for each planet (+5 to -5 scale)

dignity_status.description: Dignity descriptions (rulership, exaltation, detriment, fall, peregrine)
